ygData.subject: RE: Gypsy Lute?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It took me 4 and a half hours to get a carapace = Everything else was not much of a problem (still have yet to loot my own lambent stone ). As far as
ygData.messageBody:
>it never even crossed my mind to test it, sorry all. i went straight to
>getting the breastplate. i am under the assumption that although all of
>the
>items needed for the lambent armor quests are usable and have stats, they
>are solely meant for these quests. hopefully someone will do some tests
>before turning it in.
>
>as far as where it comes from, it's not the named gypsy musician, it is off
>the non-named gypsy musicians. they merely are "Gypsy Musician" and are in
>the piano room of mistmoore castle. if they have a lute you can see them
>holding it.
>
>i didn't get reimbursed, cause in fact i was wrong, like other bards.
>makes
>perfect sense though, since the lute of the gypsy princess is totally
>dissimilar to all of the other quest components (off rare named npc,
>neither
>lore nor no drop). so far, every component is extremely common on these
>mobs. the random number generator plays tricks sometimes. i have gotten
>the item needed on the first or second kill on many occassions (Froon,
>Choon, Solusek Mage), while for a friend it has taken 5 hours (Griffenne
>Charm).
>
>Shada
>

It took me 4 and a half hours to get a carapace =\
Everything else was not much of a problem (still have yet to loot my own
lambent stone ).

As far as Genni, she is also broken on Veeshan. Someone trained her to zone
or something and she got stuck and poofed or something. She is supposedly
going to be restored on Tuesday (hopefully).

Good luck getting the rest of the armor =)

On a side note, my friend says there seem to be slightly less wandering mobs
in PoF, but since they are still new at hunting their they get their butts
kicked regularly. Here's to perseverance!

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
